column1: 252299,Drama Therapist,,"Develop treatment plans that use non-medical therapies
column3: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column5: Interact with patients to build rapport or provide emotional support
column9: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column13: Prepare reports summarising patient diagnostic or care activities
column17: Communicate test or assessment results to medical professionals
column19: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment

column25: Analyse data to determine effectiveness of treatments or therapies
